Title: Why Election Commissioner Arun Goel Resigned Weeks Before 2024 Polls - NDTV
Summary: Election Commissioner Arun Goel resigned on Saturday just days before the anticipated announcement of the schedule for the 2024 Lok Sabha elections.
Election Commission sources added that there have been differences on file between Mr Goel and Chief Election Commissioner Rajiv Kumar.
He asked whether the current state of affairs warranted renaming the Election Commission to "Election OMISSION".
"In a sudden move, Election Commissioner Arun Goel has abruptly resigned.
That leaves the Election Commission now with just one Chief Election Commissioner," he posted on X.

Title: Farmers' 4-hour ‘rail roko’ protest today, trains to face disruptions: 10 points - Hindustan Times
Summary: Farmers, who resumed marching towards Delhi on March 6, will hold a nationwide ‘rail roko’ agitation for four hours on Sunday.
The ‘rail roko’ protest, which will be held between 12pm and 4pm, comes a few days after the ‘Delhi Chalo’ march.
Farmers to hold ‘Rail Roko’ protest today; security tightened across bordersTop updates on farmers' ‘rail roko’ protest today:The nationwide ‘rail roko’ agitation is likely to witness hundreds of farmers protesting in around 60 locations across Haryana and Punjab and is expected to cause some disruptions to the trains.
The Bharti Kisan Union (Ekta Ugrahan), Bharti Kisan Union (Dakaunda-Dhaner) and the Krantikari Kisan Union - farmers' bodies that are part of the Samyukta Kisan Morcha - will also participate in the ‘rail roko’ agitation.
The security has also been tightened across all the borders ahead of the ‘rail roko’ protest.

Title: CAA rules notified: Here is what the 2019 Bill on Citizenship Amendment Act proposed | Mint - Mint
Summary: The Citizenship (Amendment) Bill 2019 was passed in Parliament in December 2019.
The Bill proposed to amend the Citizenship Act, 1955, and sought to make foreign illegal migrants of certain religious communities from Afghanistan, Bangladesh, and Pakistan eligible for Indian citizenship, according to PRS Legislative Research.
Before the new rules were implemented, the citizenship in India was regulated by the Citizenship Act, 1955.
All legal proceedings regarding their status as illegal migrants or their citizenship will be closed, the PRS Legislative Research said.
For the specified class of illegal migrants, the number of years of residency has been relaxed to five years.

Title: India notches MIRV tech success in Agni-V firing, Pakistan failed 3 years ago - Hindustan Times
Summary: On Monday evening, India test-fired Agni-V missile with three MIRVs over a distance of over 3000 km though the range of the missile is 5000 km.
Each warhead comes down at different speeds and hits the ground with some 200 kilometres separating the point of impact.
Pakistan and its big brother China will use the Agni-V test to ensure that Islamabad does not sign the Fissile Material Cut-off Treaty (FMCT) citing asymmetric conventional force levels with India.
But the Agni-V MIRV is to deter expansionist China, which still covets parts of Indian territories after militarily occupying Tibet in 1950 using brutal force.
Due to multiple warheads, the Agni V cannot be intercepted by anti-missile shields as each nuclear warhead has different velocities and separate targets.

Title: Musheer Khan breaks Sachin Tendulkar's Ranji record in front of him with century - Hindustan Times
Summary: Musheer Khan on Tuesday became the youngest Mumbai batter to hit a century in the final of a Ranji Trophy as the 41-time champions strengthened their grip against Vidarbha in their pursuit of securing a record-extending 42nd title.
Sachin Tendulkar was in attendance to watch the Ranji Trophy final where Musheer Khan created a record (PTI-Screengrab)Musheer, who resumed on his overnight score of 51, completed his 2nd First-class century, to go with his maiden double hundred in the quarter-final against Baroda.
When play resumed on Day 3, Musheer resumed the batting with captain Ajinkya Rahane as the two continued to pile runs.
Also Read: Mumbai vs Vidarbha Ranji Trophy final updatesWatch Musheer's century below:With a clip off his pads, Musheer completed his century.
Tendulkar, a two-time Ranji Trophy winner, was in attendance at the Wankhede, to see his team add another father in its cap.
